::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus reaches the 'Ready Room' and makes it inside. =
He was very careful while moving through the ship. He knew he was being hun=
ted.
=A0
Rodimus starts to go through the office. He wondered what Percepto=
r wanted to find. As he went through files and the computer he learned that=
 several commanders hand come and gone on this ship and later base. Then ca=
me the information he would inevitably find. One document, a duty roster fr=
om many years ago, read: Commanding Officer Rodimus Prime. 
=A0
A name so l=
ike his? Dark Rodimus clicks on the link that takes him to a profile on 'Ro=
dimus Prime.' For several minutes he reads quietly as he learns the entire =
history of this Autobot. A single thought crosses his mind: is he and this =
Autobot one and the same? The file mentions a family. A Maximal wife named =
Nightlight and a daughter named Elita. The name Nightlight seemed so famili=
ar.
=A0
Dark Rodimus leans back in the chair and swivels around in thought.=
 A photograph then catches his optics. The family! He sees this Rodimus Pri=
me. He looks just like him except with a different color scheme. The daught=
er and... Nightlight! The femme that Perceptor is holding!
=A0
What does it=
 all mean?!
=A0
Rodimus reopens his commlink with Perceptor.
=A0
Rodimus: P=
erceptor... You knew what=A0I would find here. Why have me know these thing=
s? Tell me everything. And... and tell me what you plan to do with my...wif=
e?

Scourge skulked a=
long the halls even as the other sweeps, searching 
rooms and corridors wit=
h weapons drawn. They are silent and deadly, 
trained hunter terminators th=
eir optic sensors have no trouble 
penetrating the darkness emptiness of th=
e ship. Their audio sensors 
capturing the smallest sound and whisper that =
echoed through. 

Scourge fretted about the fact that as close as he was to=
 his quarry, 
he still could not break through the interference that hid hi=
s prey 
from him. 

> ::Dark Rodimus::
> 
> Rodimus unplugs from the pod.
>=
 
> Rodimus: I'll try. The CO's "Ready Room" should be near the bridge.
> 
=
> Rodimus draws his weapons and heads out into the hallway. He is in
> rout=
e to the office.

Scourge froze as he thought he heard a slight noise comin=
g from ahead 
of him in the corridor, on the way towards the bridge. With a=
 motion 
he commanded the single sweep with him to halt. ((OOC: the other 
=
sweeps are around the ship)). 

Slyly peering around the corner Scourge cou=
ld see the form of Rodimus 
walking ahead of them, further along, also on h=
is way towards the 
bridge. 

With a slight smile Scourge lifted his weapon=
 and targeted Rodimus as 
a single red targeting laser `painted' Rodimus' b=
ack . . . 

Preston
(Scourge & Sweeps)

Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus reaches the 'Ready Room' and makes it inside. He was very careful while moving through the ship. He knew he was being hunted.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus starts to go through the office. He wondered what Perceptor wanted to find. As he went through files and the computer he learned that several commanders hand come and gone on this ship and later base. Then came the information he would inevitably find. One document, a duty roster from many years ago, read: Commanding Officer Rodimus Prime. </P>
<P> </P>
<P>A name so like his? Dark Rodimus clicks on the link that takes him to a profile on 'Rodimus Prime.' For several minutes he reads quietly as he learns the entire history of this Autobot. A single thought crosses his mind: is he and this Autobot one and the same? The file mentions a family. A Maximal wife named Nightlight and a daughter named Elita. The name Nightlight seemed so familiar.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Dark Rodimus leans back in the chair and swivels around in thought. A photograph then catches his optics. The family! He sees this Rodimus Prime. He looks just like him except with a different color scheme. The daughter and... Nightlight! The femme that Perceptor is holding!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>What does it all mean?!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus reopens his commlink with Perceptor.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus: Perceptor... You knew what I would find here. Why have me know these things? Tell me everything. And... and tell me what you plan to do with my...wife?<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 6/27/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: Roots<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Friday, June 27, 2008, 1:56 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv992997460>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>Scourge skulked along the halls even as the other sweeps, searching <BR>rooms and corridors with weapons drawn. They are silent and deadly, <BR>trained hunter terminators their optic sensors have no trouble <BR>penetrating the darkness emptiness of the ship. Their audio sensors <BR>capturing the smallest sound and whisper that echoed through. <BR><BR>Scourge fretted about the fact that as close as he was to his quarry, <BR>he still could not break through the interference that hid his prey <BR>from him. <BR><BR>> ::Dark Rodimus::<BR>> <BR>> Rodimus unplugs from the pod.<BR>> <BR>> Rodimus: I'll try. The CO's "Ready Room" should be near the bridge.<BR>> <BR>> Rodimus draws his weapons and heads out into the hallway. He is in<BR>> route to the office.<BR><BR>Scourge froze as he thought he heard a slight noise coming from ahead <BR>of him in the corridor, on the way towards the bridge. With a motion <BR>he commanded the single
 sweep with him to halt. ((OOC: the other <BR>sweeps are around the ship)). <BR><BR>Slyly peering around the corner Scourge could see the form of Rodimus <BR>walking ahead of them, further along, also on his way towards the <BR>bridge. <BR><BR>With a slight smile Scourge lifted his weapon and targeted Rodimus as <BR>a single red targeting laser `painted' Rodimus' back . . . <BR><BR>Preston<BR>(Scourge & Sweeps)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
